geoprofiler.desc: Geo-Profiler is the end product for the Android Development class the iSchool offers, and was developed in collaboration with 3 other Informatics students. This application enables the user to define an area on a Google Maps interface and a time frame in which they do not want to be disturbed. If the user receives a text message during this time, our app will auto reply with a pre-defined, by the user, message.
geoprofiler.title: Geo-Profiler

mapping.desc: This web application is a visual representation of all the mass shootings in the United States in 2016.
mapping.title: Shooting Map

tos.desc: Tiles of Songs is a web application utilizing the React JavaScript library. It allows the user to query the Spotify API and play samples of the top 50 songs matching their query.
tos.title: Tiles of Songs
tos.type: Web Devlopment: React, Utilizing Web API's

tweeter.desc: Tweeter is a web application developed for the iSchool's INFO 343 class. This application uses Firebase as a backend to enable users to create accounts and post messages to chronologically ordered stream of said messages.
tweeter.title: Tweeter
